routes.name: track-of-the-day

meta.description: Get Tracks of the Day by month

query.name: length
query.description: The number of months to return

routes.content:
Get a list of month objects, each of which contains the tracks of the day for that month.

Example response (`length=1&offset=0`; made approx 3.6 hrs prior to new TOTD):

Example errors:

```json
["offset:error-propertyNotSet","length:error-propertyNotSet"]
```

```json
["length:error-greaterOrEqualThan"]
```

routes.name: season-leaderboard-top

meta.description: Get the leaderboard for a season

path.name: seasonUid
path.description: The UID of the "season". Example: the `.seasonUid` field in [Track of the Day entries](/docs/NadeoLiveServices/Campaigns/track-of-the-day.md).

query.name: onlyWorld
query.description: Whether to return only results for `zoneName == 'World'`

query.name: length
query.description: (Requires `onlyWorld=true`) The number of records to return

routes.name: map-records-top

meta.description: Get map records for a season

path.name: seasonUid
path.description: The UID of the "season". Example: the `.seasonUid` field in [Track of the Day entries](/docs/NadeoLiveServices/Campaigns/track-of-the-day.md).

query.name: onlyWorld
query.description: Whether to return only results for `zoneName == 'World'`

query.name: length
query.description: (Requires `onlyWorld=true`) The number of records to return

routes.name: players-trophies

meta.description: Gets a player's trophy count along with rankings in World, Continent, Country and Region.

routes.name: map-info

meta.description: Get a map info on Nadeo Services

routes.content:
Check if a given track by its UID is available on Nadeo Services and gives its map infos.

Example response for the track [MIDNIGHT METROPOLIS by htimh](https://trackmania.io/#/leaderboard/QleO8OiNAkIXrZs6r0YLSrLBjEi):

```json
{
    "uid": "QleO8OiNAkIXrZs6r0YLSrLBjEi",
    "mapId": "606e4e16-f1d6-467c-9859-f1837a452166",
    "name": "MIDNIGHT METROPOLIS",
    "author": "144fce06-9b90-4af9-a5b0-9148bcc0566f",
    "submitter": "144fce06-9b90-4af9-a5b0-9148bcc0566f",
    "authorTime": 55910,
    "goldTime": 60000,
    "silverTime": 68000,
    "bronzeTime": 84000,
    "nbLaps": 0,
    "valid": false,
    "downloadUrl": "https://prod.trackmania.core.nadeo.online/storageObjects/9c20aff3-2046-4d7c-aa9b-52617d8d99e2",
    "thumbnailUrl": "https://prod.trackmania.core.nadeo.online/storageObjects/4889bf39-a4f3-40b2-a582-9fa926e41930.jpg",
    "uploadTimestamp": 1631578171,
    "updateTimestamp": 1658421115,
    "fileSize": null,
    "public": false,
    "favorite": false,
    "playable": true,
    "mapStyle": "TrackMania\\TM_Race",
    "mapType": "TrackMania\\TM_Race",
    "collectionName": "Stadium"
}
```

Example response if any track does not exists:

```json
[
    "map:error-notFound"
]
```

Notes: be careful to check the response type; a valid track will return a object, **but a invalid track will return an array with a string in it.**

routes.name: add-favorite

meta.description: Add a track by its UID to your favorite tracks on Nadeo Services

routes.content:
Adds a track by its UID to your favorite tracks on Nadeo Services.

Example response:

```
Map favorite created
```

Example response if a map is unknown:

```json
[
    "map:error-notFound"
]
```

routes.name: get-favorites

meta.description: Get your favorite tracks on Nadeo Services

query.name: limit
query.description: The maximum number of tracks to return

query.name: sort
query.description: The sort order of the tracks

query.name: playable
query.description: Whether the map is validated and playable

routes.content:
Retrives your favorite tracks on Nadeo Services and get its map infos.

Example response:

```json
{
    "mapList": [
        {
            "uid": "QleO8OiNAkIXrZs6r0YLSrLBjEi",
            "mapId": "606e4e16-f1d6-467c-9859-f1837a452166",
            "name": "MIDNIGHT METROPOLIS",
            "author": "144fce06-9b90-4af9-a5b0-9148bcc0566f",
            "submitter": "144fce06-9b90-4af9-a5b0-9148bcc0566f",
            "authorTime": 55910,
            "goldTime": 60000,
            "silverTime": 68000,
            "bronzeTime": 84000,
            "nbLaps": 0,
            "valid": false,
            "downloadUrl": "https://prod.trackmania.core.nadeo.online/storageObjects/9c20aff3-2046-4d7c-aa9b-52617d8d99e2",
            "thumbnailUrl": "https://prod.trackmania.core.nadeo.online/storageObjects/4889bf39-a4f3-40b2-a582-9fa926e41930.jpg",
            "uploadTimestamp": 1631578171,
            "updateTimestamp": 1658421115,
            "fileSize": null,
            "public": false,
            "favorite": false,
            "playable": true,
            "mapStyle": "TrackMania\\TM_Race",
            "mapType": "TrackMania\\TM_Race",
            "collectionName": "Stadium"
        }
    ],
    "itemCount": 1
}
```

routes.name: remove-favorite

meta.description: Remove a track by its UID from your favorite tracks on Nadeo Services

routes.content:
Remove a track by its UID from your favorite tracks on Nadeo Services.

Example response:

```
Map favorite deleted
```

Example response if a map is unknown:

```json
[
    "map:error-notFound"
]
```

Example response if a map is not on your favorite tracks:

```json
[
    "mapFavorite:error-notFound"
]
```
